test-set.name: xp-striding-climbing-motionlessA
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Climbing, RS: Motionless Climbing axis parent, ancestor or ancestor-or-self on self or climbing axis is climbing and motionless

test-case.name: xp-striding-climbing-motionlessA001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: climbing, RS: motionless Base expression: self::foo Separators: / With axes: parent, ancestor, ancestor-or-self With node types: element, document, any-node, elem-doc Invariant: none

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests
Changed node-type for namespace-node() tests w/o axis specifier from error to namespace, see bug#26788 (only applies to relevant tests)

Changed node-type for namespace-node() tests w/o axis specifier from error to namespace, see bug#26788 (only applies to relevant tests)
